summary:
TL;DR  TL;DR means Too Long; Didn’t Read - it’s a super-brief synopsis of the larger article.
 Our body has trillions of cells, and DNA is located within every cell’s nucleus. When it comes to extracting DNA then DNA testing companies first search for the chromosomes, and then dig down a bit more to find your genes and extract the DNA from them. DNA testing companies focus on testing only 0.
